force.description: Recreate PRs even if same ones were closed previously

packageRules.description: Use fix as Semantic Commit prefix for all dependency updates except ones specified in rules below
Use chore as Semantic Commit prefix for all dependency updates in examples folder
Use chore as Semantic Commit prefix for git submodule, go.mod and pre-commit updates
Use ci as Semantic Commit prefix for GHA pipeline updates
Use the widen range strategy to allow us to lock into exact supported terraform range since terraform can release breaking changes in minor version releases.

Disable terraform provider updates by default. To enable, set enable to true below and renovate will priortise bumping this. We only need to bump this version to consume required bug fixes and/or new provider features.
Prioritise terraform module updates for terragrunt
Custom regex required to bump IBM detect secrets
